external_games.name: New Yankee in King Arthur's Court 5 Collector's Edition
New Yankee in King Arthur's Court 5 Collector's Edition

name: New Yankee in King Arthur's Court 5: Collector's Edition
summary: New Yankee in King Arthur's Court V Collector's Edition takes you back into a world of knights and dragons. Join Sir John and Lady Mary as they're pulled back in time to save King Arthur from a fate worse than helmet hair! Take on magical obstacles as you manage time and resources. The fate of the kingdom lies in your hands! Enter New Yankee in King Arthur's Court V Collector's Edition today!
